Description: 
This application implements a command called "CircleJig" to demonstrate the use of the EntityJig class, which provides a way to preview the real-time result determinded by the params that you specify during the process of drawing.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "DotNetSamples.sln"ï¼Œthen build the application.

To use CircleJig.dll:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing .
2. Run NETLOAD command and load the CircleJig.dll file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "CircleJig" command. In this command, you can draw a circle by specifying the center and radius.
